pages.title: Register to the Find a Covid-19 Test Provider Abroad service

components.name: rhnpiT
components.content:
COVID-19 test providers outside the UK can register online to be added to the UK Foreign, Commonwealth & Development Office (FCDO) Find a COVID-19 test provider abroad service. The service helps British nationals book a test abroad before they return to the UK.

To be eligible to be added to the provider list your organisation will need:

  • to be legally authorised to provide COVID-19 tests that meet the applicable standard (‘UK standards’) for travellers returning to England, Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland
  • to be able to communicate with customers in English
  • to provide COVID-19 tests results over email, SMS or printed paper in English, French or Spanish
  • contact details (main contact name, email address and telephone number)

Read the coronavirus test guidance for more information on UK standards for COVID-19 test providers.

If you have more than 1 test site

If you have more than 1 test site you will need to fill in a separate registration form for each site you want to be included in the list.

pages.title: Check answers before you submit
Can your organisation communicate with customers in English?

components.name: speakEnglish
components.title: Can your organisation communicate with customers in English?
components.hint: If a British national needs to communicate in English you will need to have someone in your organisation who can provide support.

pages.title: Is your organisation authorised to provide COVID-19 tests in your country?

components.name: isQualified
components.title: Is your organisation authorised to provide COVID-19 tests in your country?

pages.title: Main point of contact

components.name: beQbsQ
components.content:
These details are for the British embassy to use when they contact you about your registration and will not be shared publicly.
Provide details for the main point of contact in your organisation. We will send a verification email to the address you provide.

pages.title: Organisation name

components.name: locationName
components.title: Test site location name
components.hint:
Give the specific name of the branch, building, street or temporary location of your testing site. For example, London Oxford Street, or Peckham Leisure Centre.</br>
If you have more than 1 test site you will need to fill in a separate registration form for each site.

pages.title: Website address

components.name: website
components.title: Website address
components.hint: This will be published on GOV.UK

pages.title: Email address

components.name: publicEmailAddress
components.title: Email address
components.hint: This will be published on GOV.UK. British nationals will use this email address to contact your organisation about COVID-19 tests.

pages.title: How can people book a COVID-19 test with your organisation?

components.name: bookingOptions
components.title: Booking options
components.hint: Choose as many options as relevant

pages.title: Can your organisation provide test results in English or French or Spanish?

components.name: mCWgAH
components.content:
When you provide COVID-19 test results they must be in English or French or Spanish.
You only need to provide results in 1 of these languages to be added to the list.

components.name: provideResultsInEnglishFrenchSpanish
components.title: Can your organisation provide test results in English or French or Spanish?

pages.title: Your organisation cannot be added to the service

components.name: gjJiCS
components.content: Only organisations that are authorised to provide COVID-19 tests can be added to the 'Find a COVID-19 test provider abroad' service.

pages.title: Telephone number

components.name: phoneNumber
components.title: Phone number
components.hint: This is the phone number your company or facility wishes to be contacted on by British nationals. This will be published on GOV.UK.

pages.title: Address

components.name: pumJJx
components.content: This will be published on GOV.UK

components.name: country
components.title: Country
components.hint: Please write the country in English

pages.title: Declaration

components.name: VUylUR
components.content:
You must declare that you are:

  • currently qualified to provide COVID-19 tests
  • able to provide COVID-19 tests to the applicable Department for Transport standards for entry to the UK
  • reliable and willing to help on a regular basis
  • able to respond within a reasonable timeframe to client requests
  • willing to update or re-confirm your details on a bi-annual basis on request
  • aware that inclusion on the 'Find a COVID-19 test provider abroad' service is not an endorsement by the FCDO and you are not affiliated to the FCDO in any way
  • aware that you cannot use the FCDO or the embassy logo on your website
  • aware that by submitting your details you are agreeing for your details to appear on the GOV.UK list of covid test providers

pages.title: Your organisation cannot be added to the service

components.name: vCQCMd
components.content: Your organisation can only be added to the 'Find a COVID-19 test provider abroad' service if someone at your organisation can provide support to English-speaking British nationals.

pages.title: Your organisation cannot be added to the service

components.name: duqJXO
components.content: Only organisations that can communicate COVID-19 test results in at least 1 of English or French or Spanish can be added to the 'Find a COVID-19 test provider abroad' service.

pages.title: How does your organisation provide proof of a COVID-19 test result?

components.name: resultsFormat
components.title: How does your organisation provide proof of a COVID-19 test result?
components.hint: This is the format that confirms the result of a COVID-19 test, which can then be used as proof before travelling. Choose as many options as relevant. You must provide confirmation in at least one of these formats to meet the requirements.

pages.title: Can your organisation provide COVID-19 tests that meet UK standards?

components.name: sKaEis
components.content: The test must meet performance standards of ≥97% specificity and ≥80% sensitivity at viral loads above 100,000 copies/ml. Types of tests you could provide include a nucleic acid test, including a polymerase chain reaction (PCR) test; derivative technologies including loop-mediated isothermal amplification (LAMP) tests; or an antigen test, such as a test from a lateral flow device.

components.name: meetUKstandards
components.title: Can your organisation provide COVID-19 tests that meet UK standards?

pages.title: Your organisation cannot be added to the service

components.name: vTPFBI
components.content:
<div class="govuk-hint">
Only organisations that meet UK standards can be added to the 'Find a COVID-19 test provider abroad' service.
<div/>

pages.title: Which body has authorised your organisation to provide COVID-19 tests?

components.name: regulatoryAuthority
components.title: Which body has authorised your organisation to provide COVID-19 tests?
components.hint: For example the government, a medical association or other relevant authority

pages.title: Can your organisation provide COVID-19 test results within 72 hours?

components.name: provideTestResultsIn72Hours
components.title: Can your organisation provide COVID-19 test results within 72 hours?
components.hint: This is the time it takes from a person taking a test to receiving a result. British nationals require that they receive the result of the COVID-19 test  within 72 hours before returning to the UK

pages.title: Your organisation cannot be added to the service

components.name: FaxMPv
components.content: Only organisations that can provide COVID-19 test results within 72 hours can be added to the 'Find a COVID-19 test provider abroad' service.

pages.title: Which COVID-19 tests does your organisation provide?

components.name: yMUmdI
components.content:
The test must meet performance standards of ≥97% specificity and ≥80% sensitivity at viral loads above 100,000 copies/ml. Types of tests you could provide include a nucleic acid test, including a polymerase chain reaction (PCR) test; derivative technologies including loop-mediated isothermal amplification (LAMP) tests; or an antigen test, such as a test from a lateral flow device.
Please only select the tests that meet the above standards.

components.hint: This is how you let someone know that their test result is ready to access. Choose as many options as relevant.
